ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectBC Hydro Site C Clean energy Project
PrecisOrder making effective the decision that the significant adverse environmental effects that the BC HYDRO SITE C CLEAN ENERGY PROJECT, near Fort St.John, British Columbia, is likely to cause are justified in the circumstances.
